name: Frequently Bought Together for LearnDash
author: SaffireTech

sections.description:
Frequently Bought Together for LearnDash is a plugin that allows you to display a section that shows courses most usually bought together with the course listing watched by customers.

Bundle Courses without Creating Duplicate Listings
By default, LearnDash allows you to create course bundles but if you have several course bundles to offer then it creates multiple duplicate listings which you don’t want. This plugin allows you to select and bundle courses on a course page, displays it on that course page and enables buyers to buy the bundled courses on a single click without creating multiple duplicate listings on your LearnDash site.

Boosts Visibility and thus Sales of your courses
Since the Frequently Bought Together (FBT) widget is displayed on the course page, it enables buyers to explore other courses that are related to the course they are watching on the site. Thus increasing visibility and sales of your store.

Quick Set Up
FBT widget can be set easily from the LearnDash course page. You just select the courses you want to offer together, hit save and voila it’s done!

Features

Allows you to Bundle Multiple Courses on a single click of button from the course page.
Allows you to Show Enrollment Count for each of the courses in the FBT widget.
Easy to use interface to quickly set up the FBT widget.

With Frequently Bought Together For LearnDash Pro, you get the following features –

  • Bundle Standard WooCommerce Product Types with Courses – Allows you to bundle Simple and Variation Product types along with your courses for a more comprehensive offering.

  • WooCommerce / Easy Digital Downloads (EDD) Integration – Allows you to also set the FBT widget on WooCommerce product page / EDD downloads page.

  • Offer Discounts – Allows you to offer Fixed or Percentage based discounts for the bundled offering in the FBT widget.

  • Widget Flexibility – You can choose to show the FBT widget below the course description or you can opt to place the widget using shortcode anywhere on the LearnDash course page. You also get options to choose the size of the course thumbnail image in the widget.

Check all Features & Pricing | View Demo

Our Recommended Plugins: UpSells for LearnDash

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/saffire-frequently-bought-together-learndash directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Access the plugin under LearnDash LMS > Settings > Frequently Bought together
sections.changelog:
2.0.3 2024-08-07

  • Update – Tested with LearnDash version 4.15.2 .
  • Update – Tested with WooCommerce version 9.1.4 .
  • Update – Tested with Easy Digital Download(EDD) version 3.3.2 .

2.0.2 2024-05-02

  • Fix – Minor UI fixes for FBT widget on course page.

2.0.1 2024-04-20

  • New – Compatibility with WPML and Loco.

2.0.0 2024-04-02

  • Update – Refactored the code to work with product IDs/downlaod IDs instead of course IDs.
  • Update – Tested with LearnDash version 4.12.1 .
  • Update – Tested with WooCommerce version 8.7.0 .
  • Update – Tested with Easy Digital Download(EDD) version 3.2.11 .

1.0.8 2024-02-12

  • Fix – UI for settings.

1.0.7 2024-02-09

  • Fix – Select2 confict with ACF .
  • Update – Tested with WordPress version 6.4.3.
  • Update – Tested with LearnDash version 4.12.1.
  • Update – Tested with WooCommerce version 8.5.2.
  • Update – Tested with Easy Digital Download(EDD) version 3.2.7.1.

1.0.6 2023-10-20

  • Fix – Improved UI for Settings .

1.0.5 2023-09-09

  • Fix – Compatibility with PHP 8.1.21 .

1.0.4 2023-09-09

  • Fix – Critical error fixed.

1.0.3 2023-08-30

  • Fix – Appearance of FBT widget when only one course in the widget is left to be enrolled
  • Update – Tested with WordPress version 6.3.1.
  • Update – Tested with LearnDash version 4.5.3.
  • Update – Tested with WooCommerce version 8.0.3.
  • Update – Tested with Easy Digital Download(EDD) version 3.1.5.
  • Update – Tested with HPOS compatibility

1.0.2 2023-04-14

  • Update – Tested with WordPress version 6.2.
  • Update – Tested with LearnDash version 4.5.3.
  • Update – Tested with WooCommerce version 7.6.0.
  • Update – Tested with Easy Digital Download(EDD) version 3.1.1.3.

1.0.1 2023-03-11

  • Update – Tested with WordPress version 6.1.1
